infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to scan QR codes on your Psilly bottles.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs calendar access to schedule reliable reminders for your post-dose check-ins.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to create reminders for your post-dose check-ins.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Psilly Journal to access your camera to scan QR codes on your bottles.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow Psilly Journal to access your calendar to schedule reliable reminders for your post-dose check-ins.
